scripts.package:win: pnpm run version:bump:desktop && pnpm build && node ./scripts/prepare-electron-stage.cjs && pnpm exec electron-builder --config electron-builder.stage.yml --publish never --win portable --x64
scripts.package:win:dir: pnpm run version:bump:desktop && pnpm build && node ./scripts/prepare-electron-stage.cjs && pnpm exec electron-builder --config electron-builder.stage.yml --publish never --win --dir --x64
